contentBlocks.title: General Pool Lighting Requirements
paragraphs: Pool lighting must be energy efficient and meet minimum efficiency requirements.
Pool lighting must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool lighting must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Pool lighting must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.

contentBlocks.title: Energy Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: Pool lighting must meet minimum energy efficiency requirements as specified in the NCC.
Pool lighting must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.
Pool lighting must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool lighting must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.

contentBlocks.title: Installation Requirements
paragraphs: Pool lighting must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool lighting must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Pool lighting must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.
Pool lighting must be installed by a qualified person.
